body_html: @vrv @caisq @gunan I was also wondering if this change to master could be cherry-picked for the final 1.0 release, or maybe even now. From what I understand, the concern is not the Pascal cubins in the Docker containers, but the pip package size limitations. So, maybe it would be OK to add this change to r1.0 as well for the gpu-devel container, once "latest" is released with r1.0? I know of several public users who would appreciate that.

body: @vrv @caisq @gunan I was also wondering if this change to master could be cherry-picked for the final 1.0 release, or maybe even now. From what I understand, the concern is not the Pascal cubins in the Docker containers, but the pip package size limitations. So, maybe it would be OK to add this change to r1.0 as well for the gpu-devel container, once "latest" is released with r1.0? I know of several public users who would appreciate that.
